meanings.sent1: The stress ball is squeezable and helps me relax.
meanings.sent2: The sponge is squeezable, making it easy to clean dishes.
meanings.sent3: The squeezable toy made funny noises when I pressed it.
meanings.sent4: Her heart felt squeezable with joy when she saw her family.
meanings.sent5: The squeezable tube of toothpaste made it convenient to brush my teeth.

meanings.definition: Able to be compressed or deformed by pressure.
meanings.sent1: The squeezable packaging protected the fragile items inside.
meanings.sent2: The squeezable bottle collapsed easily when squeezed.
meanings.sent3: I found it amusing how the squeezable stress ball regained its shape.
meanings.sent4: Her hopes felt squeezable under the weight of disappointment.
meanings.sent5: The squeezable foam mattress adjusted perfectly to my body shape.
